channel.title: Export results of queries containing parameters to Google Sheet
channel.description:
Hi there,
We are trying to export query results of queries with parameters to Google Sheets but we are getting `Resource at url not found.` error
How can we fix it [workaround] or if there are any settings/parameters we can adjust on redash organization level to get this export feature working ?
Thank you in advance
Best regards Abdelkerim DevOps engineer at [Obytes](https://www.obytes.com/)
